titleInfo.title: Advertisement for the Grand Opening of the Jewish Theatre

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''From Denver Jewish News, c. 1923.''

mods.abstract: Advertisement for the grand opening of the Yiddish theater at the Palm Theatre, 3116 W. Colfax Avenue in Denver, Colorado that appeared in the Denver Jewish News. The opening night performance was The Price of Love on September 12, 1923. The Jewish Theatre was established by the Jewish Theatrical Company, organized by the Josephson family. The Jewish Theatrical Company operated from 1922 to 1926.
mods.note: Donated by the Denver Jewish News.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
